text: Charlie Ross Heaton (born 6 February 1994) is a British actor and musician. He portrays Jonathan Byers in the Netflix series Stranger Things. He will star in the upcoming superhero/horror movie The New Mutants (2020). He has also appeared in Casualty. Heaton was born in Bridlington, East Yorkshire, England. He moved to London at the age of 16. He has a son, Archie (born 2014), with his ex-girlfriend Akiko Matsuura. As of 2016 he is in relationship with co star of stranger things Natalia Dyer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English rock musicians Category:English television actors
title: Charlie Heaton
